title: Interval of convergence of a harmonic series

content.prompt: The radius of convergence for the power series  ∑ n = 1 ∞ ( x − 3 ) 2 n n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@446D@  is equal to 1. What is the interval of convergence?

topic.text: 10.13: (BC ONLY) Radius and Interval of Convergence of Power Series

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
